author: Jennifer Danowski
text:
We are  currently evaluating the options for dealing with Variable Hour Employees in regards to Healthcare Reform.  These are employees who are not full-time but who work over 30 hours/week on average. Healthcare reform states that these employees must be offered health insurance.
What have other cities been doing to address this part of the legislation?  Have you been limiting employee hours?  Giving everyone insurance? Something else?
title: Healthcare Reform-Strategies for Handeling Variable Hour Employees
